name: Gendering Global Asia
description: This course offers students a critical and analytical perspective on issues of gender history, equity, discrimination, resistance, and struggle facing societies in East and South Asia and their diasporas.
prerequisites: 8.0 credits, including 0.5 credit at the A-level, and 1.0 credit at the B-level in AFS, CLA, FST, GAS, HIS, or WST courses
